trans-unit.source: Enables collections to have the functionalities of current record management, custom sorting, filtering, and grouping.
trans-unit.target: 讓集合擁有目前記錄管理、 自訂排序、 篩檢與群組的功能。

trans-unit.source: The interface is implemented by the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> class, which is the base class for <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingListCollectionView>, <xref:System.Windows.Data.ListCollectionView>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 介面由實作<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>類別，這是基底類別的<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingListCollectionView>， <xref:System.Windows.Data.ListCollectionView>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Data.ListCollectionView> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingListCollectionView> </xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this view supports filtering via the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.Filter*> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示此檢視是否支援透過篩選<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.Filter*>屬性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.Filter*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this view support filtering; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此檢視支援篩選。，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this view supports grouping via the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.GroupDescriptions*> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出此檢視是否支援透過群組<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.GroupDescriptions*>屬性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.GroupDescriptions*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this view supports grouping; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此檢視支援分組。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this view supports sorting via the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.SortDescriptions*> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示此檢視是否支援透過排序<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.SortDescriptions*>屬性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.SortDescriptions*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this view supports sorting; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此檢視支援排序，，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether a given item belongs to this collection view.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出指定的項目是否屬於此集合檢視。

trans-unit.source: This method does not make any assumptions about whether the item belongs to the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會假設項目是否屬於基礎集合。

trans-unit.source: The object to check.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查的物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item belongs to this collection view; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果項目屬於此集合檢視。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cultural info for any operations of the view that may differ by culture, such as sorting.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定文化資訊，可能會因文化特性，例如排序檢視任何作業。

trans-unit.source: The culture to use during sorting.
trans-unit.target: 要在排序期間使用的文化特性。

trans-unit.source: When implementing this interface, raise this event after the current item has been changed.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個介面時，引發這個事件之後已變更的目前項目。

trans-unit.source: Classes that are implementing this interface should raise the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanging> event and check the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CurrentChangingEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property value before changing the currency and raising CurrentChanged event.
trans-unit.target: 會實作這個介面的類別應該引發<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanging>事件，並查看<xref:System.ComponentModel.CurrentChangingEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性值變更為貨幣，並引發 CurrentChanged 事件之前。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CurrentChangingEventArgs.Cancel%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanging>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: When implementing this interface, raise this event before changing the current item.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個介面時，請變更目前的項目之前引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: Event handler can cancel this event.
trans-unit.target: 事件處理常式可以取消此事件。

trans-unit.source: Classes that are implementing this interface should raise the CurrentChanging event and check the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CurrentChangingEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property value before changing the currency and raising <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 會實作這個介面的類別應該引發 CurrentChanging 事件和檢查<xref:System.ComponentModel.CurrentChangingEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性值變更為貨幣，並引發之前<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanged>事件。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanged> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CurrentChangingEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current item in the view.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前的項目檢視中。

trans-unit.source: The current item of the view or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there is no current item.
trans-unit.target: 檢視的目前項目或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果沒有目前的項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the ordinal position of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*> within the view.
trans-unit.target: 取得的序數位置<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*>檢視內。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*>

trans-unit.source: The ordinal position of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*> within the view.
trans-unit.target: 序數位置<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*>檢視內。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*>

trans-unit.source: Enters a defer cycle that you can use to merge changes to the view and delay automatic refresh.
trans-unit.target: 進入延後循環，您可以用來合併變更到檢視，並且延遲自動重新整理。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IDisposable> object that you can use to dispose of the calling object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IDisposable>可用來處置呼叫物件的物件。</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a callback used to determine if an item is suitable for inclusion in the view.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定回呼，用來判斷項目是否適合包含在檢視中。

trans-unit.source: A method used to determine if an item is suitable for inclusion in the view.
trans-unit.target: 用來判斷項目是否適合包含在檢視中的方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.GroupDescription"></xref> objects that describe how the items in the collection are grouped in the view.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合的<xref href="System.ComponentModel.GroupDescription"></xref>物件會描述如何檢視中分組集合內的項目。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.GroupDescription"></xref> objects that describe how the items in the collection are grouped in the view.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.ComponentModel.GroupDescription"></xref>物件會描述如何檢視中分組集合內的項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the top-level groups.
trans-unit.target: 取得最上層群組。

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection of the top-level groups or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there are no groups.
trans-unit.target: 最上層群組的唯讀集合或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果沒有群組。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*> of the view is beyond the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*>檢視的是，超過集合的結尾。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*>

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*> of the view is beyond the end of the collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*>檢視的是集合的結尾之外否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*> of the view is beyond the beginning of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*>檢視的是，超過集合的開頭。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*>

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*> of the view is beyond the beginning of the collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*>檢視的是，超過集合的開頭否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the resulting view is empty.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出產生的檢視是否為空白。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the resulting view is empty; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果產生的檢視是空的。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified item to be the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*> in the view.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的項目設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*>檢視中。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*>

trans-unit.source: The item to set as the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*>.
trans-unit.target: 將設定為<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*>項目

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the resulting <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*> is within the view; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果產生<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*>位於檢視; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*>

trans-unit.source: Sets the first item in the view as the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*>.
trans-unit.target: 設定為<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*>檢視中的第一個項目

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the resulting <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*> is an item within the view; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果產生<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*>是檢視; 內的項目否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*>

trans-unit.source: Sets the last item in the view as the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*>.
trans-unit.target: 設定為<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*>檢視中的最後一個項目

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the resulting <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*> is an item within the view; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果產生<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*>是檢視; 內的項目否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*>

trans-unit.source: Sets the item after the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*> in the view as the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*>.
trans-unit.target: 設定後的項目<> *> 中做為檢視<> *>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the resulting <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*> is an item within the view; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果產生<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*>是檢視; 內的項目否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*>

trans-unit.source: Sets the item at the specified index to be the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*> in the view.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的索引處的項目設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*>檢視中。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*>

trans-unit.source: The index to set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*> to.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定索引<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*>以。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the resulting <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*> is an item within the view; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果產生<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*>是檢視; 內的項目否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*>

trans-unit.source: Sets the item before the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*> in the view as the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*>.
trans-unit.target: 設定項目之前<> *> 中做為檢視<> *>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the resulting <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*> is an item within the view; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果產生<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*>是檢視; 內的項目否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*>

trans-unit.source: Recreates the view.
trans-unit.target: 重新建立檢視。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescription"></xref> objects that describe how the items in the collection are sorted in the view.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合的<xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescription"></xref>說明如何在檢視中分組的項目集合中的物件。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescription"></xref> objects that describe how the items in the collection are sorted in the view.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescription"></xref>說明如何在檢視中分組的項目集合中的物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回基礎集合。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> object that is the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>物件為基礎的集合。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>
